FuncDef: The refresh bgp command manually performs a soft reset on BGP connections. The refresh bgp command manually performs a soft reset on BGP connections.
CLIs: refresh bgp { all | <ipv4-address> | external | internal | group <group-name> | <ipv6-address> } { export | import }
refresh bgp vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ipv4-family { all | <ipv4-address> | external | internal | group <group-name> } { export | import }
refresh bgp [ instance <bgpName> ] vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ipv6-family { all | <ipv6-address> | external | internal | group <group-name> } { export | import }
refresh bgp vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ipv6-family <ipv4-address> { export | import }

ParaDef.Info:
Softly resets all the BGP IPv4 connections.
-

Specifies the IPv4 address of a BGP peer.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Performs a soft reset on IBGP connections.
-

Specifies the name of a BGP peer group.
The value is a string of 1 to 47 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. The character string can contain spaces if it is enclosed with double quotation marks (").

Specifies the IPv6 address of a BGP peer.
The value is in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Softly resets the connection of a specified VPN instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot be _public_. If spaces are used, the string must be enclosed in double quotation marks (" ").

Indicates the IPv6 address family.

 NOTE: This parameter is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
-

Displays BGP routes of a specified BGP multi-instance.

 NOTE: This parameter is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters without any spaces. The character string can contain spaces if it is enclosed with double quotation marks (").

ExtraInfo: If the peer of a device supports route-refresh, you can run this command on the device to softly reset the BGP connection with the peer. BGP soft resetting can be used to refresh the BGP routing table and apply new routing policies, without tearing down any BGP connection.
